General.Name: Wieson Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Wieson Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells interconnect components and wireless components. It offers I/O connectors, board mount connectors, connecters and cables, waterproof solutions, card and socket connecters, cable assemblies, and automotive electronics, as well as RF, outdoor, holder, and GNSS antennas. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 237, Datong Rd., New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22161
